short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dictionary helps you to remember new words and getting results from most well-known dictionaries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for an effective way to expand your vocabulary? Try out our new Chrome extension, a comprehensive language tool that combines the strengths of Oxford, Merriam-Webster, and Urban Dictionary, providing word definitions from British English, American English, and the latest online slang.

What sets our extension apart is its ability to store the context in which you encounter new words. It remembers the website you're browsing, the sentence where the word is used, and the time of your search. By doing so, it helps you build a personalized vocabulary list - a feature designed to enhance your language learning experience and improve memory retention.

Moreover, the extension creates custom self-assessments from your searched words. You can use these to revisit and reinforce your learning at intervals - daily, weekly, monthly, or every three months. This spaced repetition approach aligns with proven learning techniques to optimize your memory retention.

Our Chrome extension is more than just a dictionary. It's a learning aid that turns your browsing activity into a tailored language learning experience. Give it a try and see how it can make expanding your vocabulary more engaging and effective.
